Name: Yanfei
Title: Wise Innocence: Yanfei
Desc: One who fails to revise the classics is liable to fall foul of the law.
Source: Reward for inviting Yanfei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

13082.Name: Signed Edict
13082.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT] and attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113081]</color> to this character.

C113081.Name: Scarlet Seal
C113081.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a $[K51]: </color>Damage dealt +2.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>. (Can stack up to 2 times)

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C113082.Name: Brilliance
C113082.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character uses a $[K51]: </color>Spend 1 less <color=#FF9999FF>$[K303]</color>. (Once every round.)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase: </color>Attach $[K1010] to this character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>.

K51.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Charged Attack</color>
K51.Desc: Before your Action Phase, should the total number of your Elemental Dice be even, your Normal Attack will be considered a Charged Attack.

K303.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#1103}Pyro
K303.Desc: Spend the <color=#FF9999FF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1103}Pyro</color> Dice you have rolled to pay for this cost.\n({SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Dice may also be used to pay for this.)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
